item.title: 2 dead in shooting in northern Canada, no active threat: Officials
item.description: "Multiple" fatalities were reported from a shooting in the Cree First Nation community of Mistissini in northern Quebec, Canada, local officials said.

item.title: WATCH: United States of Hot Cocoa crowns a winner
item.description: Celebrity judges try the best hot cocoa from across the country to decide on their top pick.

item.title: Minneapolis live updates: Homan pledges unprofessional officers will be 'dealt with'
item.description: The Trump administration is grappling with the fallout from the Minneapolis shooting.

item.title: Possible blizzard headed to Southeast: What to expect
item.description: A potential blizzard is headed to the Southeast this weekend, impacting the Carolinas, Georgia, Virginia and Tennessee.
